amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete section 757 which prohibited funds from being used for the implementation of Country of Origin Labeling for meat and meat products.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in the Congressional Record to strike section 759 from the bill relating to the delay in country of origin labeling for meat and meat products.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rehberg amendment Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 240 (Roll no. 231).
